                         java.lang.String queryText2)
                           throws ParseException,
                                  java.io.IOException
        Send two queries to the index. For each query, form a tfidf vector that represents N top matching documents. Return cosine similarity between the two tfidf vectors.
        Throws:

      • makeTfIdfVector

        private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> makeTfIdfVector(java.util.ArrayList<Terms> termFreqVectors)
                                                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Return a hash table that maps terms to their tfidf values. The input is a list of TermFreqVector objects. The return value is formed by summing up individual tfidf vectors.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
